data.communities:
Who in their right mind would want to discuss a DID? I want a Perl
    program to jump through the DOD hoops instead of me.
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This is a 2167A (Defense System Software Development Standard) DID.
    This DID details the information that should be included in Computer
    Programming Manual.

    Tim Bruce suggestion for top level is Standard::US_DOD:: Sean M.
    Burke's is Test::

    I like a variation of Bruce's US_DOD::

    The best Module List Chaper for US_DOD:: is

    3) Development Support
